page.title: 10NEW ABBEY - INDUSTRY (1)
page.content: There has been a sawmill in New Abbey for many years. Today it employs 47 people,either harvesting the trees, working in the sawmill itself, or transporting the sawn products. In factories most goods are loaded on transport by fork-lift trucks which use wooden pallets, each of which may carry up to 2 tonnes in weight. This sawmill makes over 100000 pallets each year in about 150 different sizes. All sizes and kinds of trees are used at the mill, from the thinnings of young plantations to mature giants. For agricultural purposes most timber must be treated with a preservative. A modern pressure impregnation plant is in constant use. Celcurised timber is used extensively in fencing and in farm buildings.About 15000 tonnes of timber,grown mostly within a 30 mile radius,is used annually at the mill.
